page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox indexfrompoint method

argument.name: x
argument.description: The X coordinate in pixels of a point.

argument.name: y
argument.description: The Y coordinate in pixels of a point.

return.name: index
return.description: The list row index of the given point. A value of -1 will be returned if the coordinates are not over list row.

page.description: Get the index of the list row matching the passed in coordinates.
